summary: Video: Nintendo Minute Does A Mar10 Day Character Bracket For Mario's Enemies
title: Video: Nintendo Minute Does A Mar10 Day Character Bracket For Mario's Enemies
body:
Video: Nintendo Minute Does A Mar10 Day Character Bracket For Mario’s Enemies

Nintendo Minute‘s latest episode has arrived, and it is just in time for a special occasion. Kit and Krysta said in the video description that “to celebrate Mar10 Day, we thought we’d do a fun character bracket for our favorite enemies from Mario games! There are so many fun enemies in the Mushroom Kingdom each with their own unique personalities and design so we’re ranking them with a score…

View On WordPress

blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

summary: Fire Emblem: Three Houses releases worldwide on July 26th. With the release date getting closer, Nintendo has decided to unveil...
body:
Fire Emblem: Three Houses releases worldwide on July 26th. With the release date getting closer, Nintendo has decided to unveil the final images for a limited edition of the game that will be released in Japan. It is called the “Fodlan Collection”, and it will have lots of bonus items. The box art was revealed, which will be the same for both versions of the game. Also included is a 128-page Fodlan art book, 33-track soundtrack CD and a Nintendo Switch cartridge steel case, All of the released images can be seen down below.

Source

Thanks to Nephstinus for the tip!

Nintendo Has Revealed The Final Images For The Japanese Fire Emblem: Three Houses “Fodlan Collection” Limited Edition Fire Emblem: Three Houses releases worldwide on July 26th. With the release date getting closer, Nintendo… 91 more words
